metadata.title: CVE-2018-18718 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gThumb through 3.6.2. There is a double-freevulnerability in the add_themes_from_dir method in dlg-contact-sheet.cbecause of two successive calls of g_free, each of which frees the samebuffer.

criterions.comment: gthumb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
